title: GGMF isn't an Ultimate Skin - it's a Legendary Skin with 3 Chromas that you're forced to buy.
body:
1. Ignore the fact that MF really didn't need another skin.
2. Ignore the fact that AD Carries now have two 'Ultimate' skins while Top Lane still has none.

The issue is that it's not an Ultimate skin - it's merely a Legendary Skin with 3 Chromas that you're forced to buy.

GGMF costs 2775 RP. A Legendary Skin costs 1820 RP. A Chroma Costs 290 RP. Base GGMF + 3 Chromas should cost 2690 RP. The ability to change the chroma in-game when players will simply prefer one Chroma (I'm 99% sure this is the case with DJ Sona and Elementalist Lux) is worth sweet fuck-all.

**The simplest solution would be to admit that GGMF is only a Legendary Tier Skin. Most people don't care that it's so expensive - they care that you took up this year's Ultimate Skin slot with a Legendary Skin that has a few Chromas on release.**

The only noticeable difference is small particle changes and ult stances. Not to mention the some of the animations are too similar to the base model and even some legendary can offer more unique animations. There's many more reasons put you must of seen the posts already.

Like riot said, the skin is not to up to par to an true ultimate and people rather have it as an actual ultimate not pay for a sub par one compared to the previous skins. And I can't help to agree with *some* of them. Maybe the NAME **Chroma** is too harsh of a word for you. But the skin's forms are barely different at all compared to the previous skins. It's kind of a slap to the face to the community and betrays their own ultimate model for selling it as it now for a slightly lower price. 

In short, people just want a true ultimate skin and as I see from many posts. they feel cheated on this year.

I disagree in that they are more detailed.

They both have their ups and downs.
Elementalist luxs forms have unique recalls and their skill effects are most of the time not just recolors(there are a few though that are).
Meanwhile GGMFs skills are also not just recolors most of the time(I think the only exception is the W) and she has a unique ult animation for each form and unique animations for her guns in all of them.

And both of them have model changes that go beyond just recolors.

Elementalist Lux has different particles in every form. She throws bubbles in her water form, she has leaves particles in her nature form, she spits supa hot fire in her magma form. they are actually pretty beautiful to look at. And her dress changes! She wears skirts, leggings, thigh highs and more with matching hair. Lux also has special recall animations with each form!  GGMF in the other hand, her guns changes and abilities look different. No spacial recall animation like Lux, no uniform change, just chroma swaps, and the hair stays the same AND she has only 4 forms to choose. YIKES ! ! !

And Lux has no unique ult animation for her forms,no special wand/spell animations and some of her skill effects are just recolors of the others.
Not to mention that her base model is pretty simple compared to GGMF,who has essentially 4 arms placed across 2 different models and that you can only access 3 forms per game and limits your freedom for the form changes.

Overall I agree that Elementalist Lux is the better skin,but I feel like some things about GGMFs form changes just get glossed over,with most people just saying they are chromas.
